recipe.title: 2-Ingredient Soda Pop Cakes Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Mix one box of cake mix with one 12 oz (255 ml) can of soda.
Pour into a greased glass baking dish.
Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 30-40 minutes (depends on the cake mix/soda combination). Make sure not to touch it until it’s cool.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Mix one box of cake mix with one 12 oz (255 ml) can of soda.
Pour into a greased glass baking dish.
Bake at 350°F (180°C) for 30-40 minutes (depends on the cake mix/soda combination).
Make sure not to touch it until it’s cool.
